title: What are you guys looking for in a stream? Let me know!
body:
I've just entered the streaming scene and I'm loving every moment of it no matter how many viewers I have. I was just wondering, what do you guys as a community want to see in an OCE streamer? 

I know stream quality (in terms of audio and video) is one of those factors that goes into a stream appeal, (Im one of those streamers on a bad computer and internet who is trying rapidly to get a new setup), but aside from that, what is most important to you as viewers? Let me know! 

Peace guys, Luigi Bot

replies.body: humour is all I need...like don't be a faker (he doesn't talk like ever on his stream...but he has music! yay)
Thanks for the comments guys appreciate it <3

> [{quoted}](name=Luigi Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YYdogEKi,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-03-31T09:36:01.105+0000)
>
> Thanks for the comments guys appreciate it <3

No issue at all, P.S: I ain't watching your stream.

20% quality - audio/video
20% skill level
60% interaction

100% reason to watch the stream


honestly though, interaction is the most important thing for me

how you talk/interact with your stream determines if i watch or not
oh my god I love that song(monologue rather) ._.

Just look at the top streamers and try to have some of their best traits.

Someone who is decent at every role. 
Someone who has a vast game knowledge. (oddone)
Someone who is good at sharing this game knowledge. (scarra)
Someone who interacts with his viewers. (trick2g)
Someone who is funny. (blakinola)
Someone who has good music (???)

Don't try too hard, there is nothing worse than someone who is trying to be funny.
I look for beavers in a stream, they're everywhere.

1. High elo player grinding SoloQ.
or
2. Hilarious streamer that interacts with viewers.
or
3. Female.
Whatever it is that I'm looking for in a stream, I know http://www.twitch.tv/loserfruit provides it.
I watch to learn how the pros think.. And yes .. if your machines a POS and dosent stream perfectly you will lose watchers. Not like PC`s are expensive these days.
Some nice flowing water would be really great in a stream :^)
